channel.title: Need help with something a bit complicated
channel.description:
Alright, so theres this server I play called Tribulation PK, but problem is they have no downloadable client, Just a webclient. I'm pretty sure there's a way to make the desktop client, it has something to do with the cache and crap. Does anyone have a solution/idea?
If you want to see webclient heres the link:
http://www.trpk.net/webclient.html
p.s i've talked to people that have done it but they won't tell me how.
